train:
Meneni karuwa anona wedmaan. -> I came and saw the man and the dog.
Wingkeewa yeediriin. -> You.SG sing and I get up.
Ambib wedmoona awon baan. -> He saw the house and I took the pig.
Yeederenu om banuun. -> She will get up and will take the bread.
Wenenub wingkanuub. -> We will go away and will sing.
Oma oka aniib. -> They eat the bread and drink the water.
Anon ye weng wengambaranuuwa awon ye weng wengambaraneen. -> We will hear the dog and he will hear the pig.
Ok anaana oon wedmeen. -> I drank the water and she saw the fish.
Yeederenib miniib. -> They get up and come.
Wingkenu wunuun. -> She sings and goes away.
Om bene aneen. -> He takes the bread and eats it.
test: Om benu aneen
She took the bread and ate it.
Munuuna wunuub.
She comes and we go away.
Wingkiiwa wengamburuun.
They sing and she hears.
Anon ye weng wengamberenib yeedaraniib.
They will hear the dog and will get up.
Oon wedmaniina karub wedmaneeb.
I will see the fish and you will see the man.
Ok wedmeena aniin.
He sees the water and I drink it
Wananuuwa mananiib.
We will go away and they will come.
Awon biina oon been.
I take the pig and he takes the fish.
Oka ambiwa wedmene anon ye weng wengamboroon.
He saw the water and the house and heard the dog.
Om aneneb wingkeeb.
You eat the bread and sing.
response: He takes the bread and eats it.
We will hear the dog and they will get up.
I saw the water and he took the fish.
